title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2080/96 of 30 October 1996 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2213/76 and (EEC) No 3398/91 on the sale of skimmed-milk powder from public storage and Regulation (EEC) No 2315/76 on the sale of butter from public stocks
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2080/96 of 30 October 1996 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2213/76 and (EEC) No 3398/91 on the sale of skimmed-milk powder from public storage and Regulation (EEC) No 2315/76 on the sale of butter from public stocks
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following paragraph 4 is hereby added to Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2213/76:
'4. The intervention agency shall sell the skimmed-milk powder on the basis of its date of entry into storage, starting with the oldest product of the total quantity available, or, where applicable, of the quantity available in the storage depot(s) designated by the operator.`

The following paragraph 3 is hereby added to Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2315/76:
'3. The intervention agency shall sell the butter on the basis of its date of entry into storage, starting with the oldest product of the total quantity available, or, where applicable of the quantity available in the storage depot(s) designated by the operator.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following that its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 October 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
